sentences.en: Animal growth or product yield is the ultimate concern of the agriculturalist.
sentences.cn: 牲畜的生长或其产品的生产量是农学家最关心的问题.

sentences.en: In 2003, Dutch agriculturalist Marc de Ruiter saw dairy farmers in windswept Shanxi province literally pouring their milk down the drain because there was not enough demand.
sentences.cn: 2003年，荷兰农学家雷一鸣看到，风中山西省奶农，在把实实在在的牛奶倒进了水沟里，因为那里没有足够的需求。

sentences.en: In March a senior agriculturalist, Yuan Longping, accused officials in some areas of exaggerating the size of grain reserves in order to get more subsidies for storing them.
sentences.cn: 资深农业学家袁隆平在3月份曾经谴责一些地方官员虚报粮食储备数量，以此来获得更多的粮食储备补贴。

sentences.en: Thadani runs workshops and seminars on how to be a small-scale agriculturalist -- and the workshops are growing in popularity.
sentences.cn: Thadani开办了关于怎样成为一名小小农学家的讲习班和研讨会，讲习班很受欢迎。

words.tran_cn: 农业家；[农] 农场工作者

trans.tran_en: An agriculturalist is someone who is an expert on agriculture and who advises farmers
